body.p:
Alexandria July 22 1861
To His Excelency B. Magoffin Gov. Kentucky
Sir
I hereby tender to you my resignation of the Office of 1st Lieutenant of Campbell Rangers, a Company organized in Campbell County on the 18th day of February 1861.

Respectfully your Obt Servent
H. K. Smith
Campbells resignation
Campbell Co
